text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-orderableDrugForm where concept is-a CAP

name: CapsuleDrugForm
title: CapsuleDrugForm
description: A solid dosage form in which the drug is enclosed within either a hard or soft soluble container or "shell" made from a suitable form of gelatin.
